items.title: TAMIL FLASHCARD SET
items.summary: Thank you for your overwhelming response!! We have RESTOCKED!! This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards which…
items.content_html:
Thank you for your overwhelming response!!

We have RESTOCKED!!

This Flashcard set contains a total of 52 cards which includes

  • Uyir ezhuthukkal
  • Mei ezhuthukkal 
  • UyirMei ezhuthukkal (First series)

SHIPPING ONLY ON THURSDAYS. 

Printed in 300 GSM matte paper.

Card size: 9 * 13 cms

Update on shipment as on 28/03/2021: 

We are a small home based service and right now we are at native  for the upcoming general elections,so our flashcards will be shipped only after few days. Regret the inconvenience caused!

WE ALSO DO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING on REQUEST! 

You can write to tamiltoddlers@gmail.com if you're looking to buy Tamil Flashcards outside India. :) 

We have served to customers from Singapore and Norway ! 

To purchase our Flashcards , please pay through below link:

items.title: Letter of the week அ
items.summary: Happy to share the "Letter of the week Tamil" series with you all. We from Tamiltoddlers team will be…
items.content_html:
Happy to share the "Letter of the week Tamil" series with you all. We from Tamiltoddlers team will be sharing some of the ideas which you can make use for teaching your children.

Here’s what you can expect Letter of the Week Tamil :

  • Loads of free printables
  • Hands on activity ideas
  • YouTube videos and explanations of works


Make sure you have subscribed to my YouTube channel www.youtube.com/c/Tamiltoddlers for  fun activities.

For daily dose of fun activities ,follow us on Instagram:

www.instagram.com/tamiltoddlers

For now, here are some of the printables for the first Tamil letter அ , you can download them for FREE.

Letter of the week folder அ 

Dabbing the Uyir ezhuththu அ

LOTW Tamil poster

Size sorting அன்னாசி

Rhymes for the Letter அ

items.title: TAMIL SYLLABUS
items.summary: Hi, I've gone through the draft by government and tried to prepare a syllabus for Tamil which can help…
items.content_html:
Hi,

I've gone through the draft by government and tried to prepare a syllabus for Tamil which can help you and your little ones :)

Please provide the link to download for people who want it , instead of just sharing it.

Tamil KG syllabus

Thank you. 

Happy Learning :)
